goals__remit: The International Union of Marine Insurance (IUMI) is a professional body which is run by and for its members. IUMI represents national and international marine insurers and reinsurers, and considers issues of interest to the worldwide marine insurance industry. IUMI currently has 40 national associations as members, protecting and advancing their interests. IUMI’s roots date back to 1874.
